alert.note: Alert for Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 9:24PM EDT until July 27 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Owen County in northern Kentucky... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 923 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Owenton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Owenton, Corinth, Gratz, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Long Ridge, Wheatley, Natlee, New Liberty, Squiresville, Needmore, New Columbus and Elmer Davis Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
